subject: Advancing DEI in the Workplace
body:
Dear Lukas, 
I hope you are well! As a gentle reminder, our complimentary webinar is taking place next Tuesday at 12pm CT: “ 
Ask an Expert Anything: Responding to Resistance to DEI
”— 
prior registration is required
. 
Join Executive Coach and Master Facilitator Jeffrey Cookson, GHPR, SHPR for a conversation about what language to use when resistance surfaces in the workplace. Our experts will stay on the call 30 minutes after the event to discuss your specific DEI needs at United Healthcare. 
As a thank-you and incentive, we’ll provide you with a sample of one of our interactive eLearning programs. To gain access, 
schedule a time
 that’s convenient for you to discuss how LCW can reinvigorate your 2023 DEI efforts. 
I look forward to hearing from you and hope to see you on Tuesday! 
Kind regards, 
Hannah​ 
Hannah Strack 
Business Development Associate
 
+1 773-828-1202 
Would you like to meet? https://meetings.hubspot.com/hannah-strack/lcw-business-development- 
 
www
 | 
Twitter
 | 
Facebook
 | 
LinkedIn
 
On Mon, May 22, 2023 at 10:23 AM, Hannah Strack 
<
h.strack@lcwmail.com
>
 wrote: 
Dear Lukas​, 
Greetings from LCW! I hope your week is starting well. 
Beginning in 2020, we saw a resurgence of companies making unprecedented commitments to advancing DEI in the workplace. However, especially this year, we saw many of these DEI initiatives stall. Now we’re halfway through 2023, but there’s still time to move the needle from commitment to action. 
To help you make quick and sustainable progress at UnitedHealth Group, LCW is offering a 
limited-time 30% discount on any new statement of work signed by June 30, 2023
. 
To preview our expertise in action, I’d like to invite you to our complimentary webinar “ 
Ask an Expert Anything: Responding to Resistance to DEI
,” facilitated by Executive Coach and Master Facilitator Jeffrey Cookson, GPHR, SPHR. 
Join us on Tuesday, May 30 at 12pm
 as we identify specific language to use and avoid when resistance surfaces in the workplace. 
I look forward to hearing from you—let me know how LCW can best help you meet your DEI goals for 2023. 
Kind regards, 
Hannah​ 
Hannah Strack 
Business Development Associate
 
+1 773-828-1202 
Would you like to meet? https://meetings.hubspot.com/hannah-strack/lcw-business-development- 
 
www
 | 
Twitter
 | 
Facebook
 | 
LinkedIn
